# Support

Thank you for your interest in ETCETER4. Here's how to get help.

## Getting Help

### Documentation

Before opening an issue, please check the existing documentation:

- [README.md](../README.md) - Project overview and quick start
- [CONTRIBUTING.md](../CONTRIBUTING.md) - How to contribute
- [CLAUDE.md](../CLAUDE.md) - AI assistant context and code patterns
- [docs/](../docs/) - Extended documentation

### Reporting Issues

- **Bug Reports**: Use the [bug report template](.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md)
- **Feature Requests**: Use the [feature request template](.github/ISSUE_TEMPLATE/feature_request.md)
- **Security Issues**: See [SECURITY.md](../SECURITY.md) for responsible disclosure

### Before Creating an Issue

1. **Search existing issues** to avoid duplicates
2. **Update to the latest version** to see if the issue persists
3. **Collect relevant information** (browser, OS, console errors)

## Community Guidelines

- Be respectful and constructive
- Provide clear, detailed information when reporting issues
- Follow up on your issues if maintainers request more information

## Response Times

This is an artistic project maintained in spare time. Response times may vary:

- **Critical bugs**: We aim to respond within a few days
- **Feature requests**: May take longer to evaluate and prioritize
- **Questions**: Community members may also help

## Not Supported

- Custom hosting or deployment assistance
- Modifications for commercial use
- Real-time support or chat

Thank you for understanding and for being part of the ETCETER4 community.
